net.bytebuddy.asm

接口 AsmVisitorWrapper.ForDeclaredFields.FieldVisitorWrapper

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AsmVisitorWrapper.ForDeclaredFields.Entry
    封闭类:
    AsmVisitorWrapper.ForDeclaredFields

    public static interface AsmVisitorWrapper.ForDeclaredFields.FieldVisitorWrapper
    A field visitor wrapper that allows for wrapping a FieldVisitor defining a declared field.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      FieldVisitor wrap(TypeDescription instrumentedType, FieldDescription.InDefinedShape fieldDescription, FieldVisitor fieldVisitor)
      Wraps a field visitor.

    • 方法详细资料

      • wrap

        FieldVisitor wrap(TypeDescription instrumentedType,
                  FieldDescription.InDefinedShape fieldDescription,
                  FieldVisitor fieldVisitor)
        Wraps a field visitor.
        参数:
        instrumentedType - The instrumented type.
        fieldDescription - The field that is currently being defined.
        fieldVisitor - The original field visitor that defines the given field.
        返回:
        The wrapped field visitor.
